EmailTemplate.name: CLQ_Renewal of In-Home Aide Certification for Certificate
EmailTemplate.subject: Renewal of In-Home Aide Certification for Certificate # {!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is to notify you that the In-home Aide Certification for {!CLQ_Program__c.00N8G000000YLI4},{!CLQ_Program__c.00N8G000000YLIK},{!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}, will expire on {!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_Expiration_Date__c}. To continue your certification you must log on to the OCLQS system at {!CLQ_Program__c.Link} to complete the renewal process.
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347.
The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team.
ref: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Id}
This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited.
